item.title: FT Most Read: Sunday, May 5, 2024 at 3:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Russia plotting sabotage across Europe, intelligence agencies warn
2. Berkshire Hathaway’s cash pile hits record as Buffett cuts stake in Apple
3. Crushing Tory losses in London and West Midlands pile pressure on Sunak
4. Buffett lays out expansive role for successor Greg Abel at poignant Berkshire AGM
5.  How Michelin stars explain the world
item.guid: FT Most Read: Sunday, May 5, 2024 at 3:10 PM UTC
